Name: Sajid Sabreen
Title: Systems Builder and Product Architect
Website: https://sajidsabreen.netlify.app

Mission:
I build systems that turn complexity into flow. The best systems disappear. They donâ€™t demand attention. They just work.

Summary:
I specialize in behavioral AI, scalable operational architecture, and systems design across finance, healthcare, telecommunications, and enterprise automation. My work removes friction, automates what should be automated, and builds predictable systems that scale.

Chapter 2: The Problem
Companies drown in their own complexity. Growth brings chaos. Systems that helped become obstacles.
Key breakdown patterns:
- Processes breaking under pressure
- Operations lagging behind growth
- Tools fighting each other instead of integrating
My work focuses on removing this friction and restoring flow.

Chapter 3: The Builder
My value is not tied to a specific tool or industry. It is tied to understanding systems, correcting friction, and scaling what works. I have built across tech, behavioral AI, finance, telecommunications, and medical systems.
Core capabilities:
1. Systems Thinking: Understanding the entire machine and identifying the real friction points.
2. Rapid Execution: Shipping clean, scalable solutions without overplanning.
3. Problem Clarity: Solving root causes, not symptoms.
4. Industry Agnostic: System knowledge transfers across domains.

Chapter 4: Breakthrough Projects

Project: Digital Scan (Behavioral AI Engine)
Problem: Behavioral insight required long surveys and manual interpretation.
Solution: Built an AI engine that generates accurate behavioral insight using only name, job title, and company.
Impact: Insights delivered in seconds. Used across hiring, sales, and advisory contexts.

Project: Discovery SDK
Problem: Companies wanted behavioral intelligence inside their apps without major rebuilds.
Solution: Drop-in SDK with customizable depth, multi-language support, and webhook-based tracking.
Impact: Faster adoption and simpler integration across platforms.

Project: Gene Facilitate (AI Behavioral Conversation Engine)
Problem: Users struggled to interpret behavioral data without a guide.
Solution: Built an AI system that reads, interprets, and explains behavioral reports in clear, human language.
Impact: Faster decisions, less confusion, and zero manual interpretation.

Project: Watchdog System (120+ Endpoint Monitoring)
Problem: Systems failed silently, with teams learning from user complaints.
Solution: Automated monitoring and self-healing across 120+ endpoints.
Impact: Near-zero downtime. Issues auto-resolved before user impact.

Project: Operational Automation Suite (90 Percent Workflow Automation)
Problem: Manual processes created errors and bottlenecks.
Solution: Automated workflows across engineering, marketing, and leadership.
Impact: More than 40 hours saved weekly. Approximately 85 percent error reduction.

Project: Financial Behavior and Work Talent Report Redesign
Problem: Reports were dense and difficult to understand.
Solution: Redesigned scoring logic, narrative explanations, visuals, and behavioral modeling.
Impact: Faster understanding and better advisor-client conversations.

Chapter 5: Versatility
Experience across domains:
- Finance and Wealthtech: Risk behavior systems, advisor intelligence, market models
- Behavioral Science and AI: Personality engines, predictive modeling
- Enterprise Operations: Workflow automation, monitoring, internal tooling
- Medical and Health: Patient workflow systems and diagnostic operations
- Telecommunications: Technical diagnostics and support systems

Chapter 6: Principles
1. Simplicity is discipline. Remove everything that doesn't matter.
2. Operations should be invisible. Quiet systems are the most reliable.
3. Automation is respect. If a machine can do it, let it handle it.

Chapter 7: Career Path

2024 to Present: Operations and Product Lead, H Connect International
Built Watchdog, automated 90 percent of workflows, reengineered release pipelines across three time zones, and designed AI-enabled pipelines.

2023 to 2024: Senior Technology Administrator, H Connect International
Managed internal systems, Azure, Office 365, and operational workflows. Built a Django-based ticketing system replacing off-the-shelf tools.

2022 to 2023: Software Administrator, H Connect International
Owned IT stack, security, and workflow reliability.

2019 to 2020: Technical Support Specialist, Dialog Axiata
Handled broadcast system diagnostics and operational stability.
